p: The study sites are located along a North/South gradient with respect to air temperatures and soil temperatures ( Fig. 2A) and a West/East gradient with respect to precipitation ( Fig. 2B). Permafrost was found at the northernmost site Qajaa (continuous permafrost) and at the inland site of Sandnes (sporadic permafrost). The soil water contents varied substantially within and between the sites with the inland site of Sandnes being relative dry compared to the three other coastal sites ( Supplementary Fig. S8).
